text: That tide has turned. Rob Kardashian showed ex - girlfriend Rita Ora, who he infamously bashed in 2013, some support after the singer faced backlash over controversial lyrics in her new song “ Girls. ” Ora, 27, released the new single — featuring Cardi B, Bebe Rexha and Charli XCX — on Friday, May 11, and was criticized by fans for several lyrics, including “ Sometimes I just wan na kiss girls, girls, girls / Red wine, I just wan na kiss girls, girls, girls … ” and “ I am excited, I ’ m open - minded / I ’ m 50 / 50, and I ’ m never gon na hide it. ” Singer Hayley Kiyoko also blasted the song in a lengthy Instagram
